                          int... ignoreAxes)

      • sum

        public static Dataset sum(ILazyDataset data,
                          boolean ignore,
                          int... axes)
                   throws DatasetException
        Parameters:
        data -
        ignore - if true, ignore the provided axes, otherwise use only the provided axes
        axes - axes to ignore or accept, depending on the preceding flag
        Returns:
        sum
        Throws:
        DatasetException
        Since:
        2.0
